sentence.Network_en: One day virtual reality will revolutionize the entertainment industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一天虚拟现实将使娱乐业发生革命性的变化。

sentence.Network_en: The use of atomic energy will revolutionize the lives of coming generations.
sentence.Network_cn: 原子能的使用将使人类未来的生活有巨大改变.

sentence.Network_en: She did not plan to revolutionize anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 她压根不打算进行任何改革.

revolutionist 革命家revolutionize 宣传革命revolvable 能旋转的

list.abs: And July 14,1789 that populace revolutionized , that one day , had afterward become France ' s National Day ., 其中 1789年 7月 14日的那次群众革命 , 那一天 , 后来成为了法国的国庆日.
the 70s such technological developments as photocomposition and the usethe satellites and photographs have revolutionized the newspaper industry .70年代起，照相排版、通讯卫星、摄影等技术极大地改变了报纸工业。

the Nobel Prize in chemistry goes to three men who revolutionized molecular life science , Japan's Osamu Shimomura and Americans Martin Chalfie and Roger Tsien .诺贝尔化学奖授予了三位使分子生命科学发生重大变革的人：日本的下村修及美国的马丁·查尔菲和钱永健。
many modern machines have revolutionized farming ., 许多现代机器革新了耕作方法.

entry.tran: 使发生巨大变革;给…带来革命性剧变
entry.def: When something revolutionizes an activity, it causes great changes in the way that it is done.

example.ex: Over the past forty years plastics have revolutionised the way we live...
example.tran: 在过去的40年中，塑料彻底改变了我们的生活方式。

example.ex: Automation revolutionized the olive industry in the early 1970s.
example.tran: 自动化技术在20世纪70年代早期给橄榄油产业带来了一场革命。

means.word_mean: 2. overthrow by a revolution, of governments

auth_sentence.content: The object of these invaders has been to revolutionize Bulgaria.
auth_sentence.res_content: The object of these invaders has been to revolutionize Bulgaria.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The object of these invaders has been to revolutionize Bulgaria.

auth_sentence.content: The crane's heavy-lifting capability, he'd claimed, would revolutionize the way ships were built: faster and more efficiently.
auth_sentence.res_content: The crane's heavy-lifting capability, he'd claimed, would revolutionize the way ships were built: faster and more efficiently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The crane's heavy-lifting capability, he'd claimed, would revolutionize the way ships were built: faster and more efficiently.

auth_sentence.content: That magnet would help revolutionize technology, powering wind turbine motors and giving juice to electric cars.
auth_sentence.res_content: That magnet would help revolutionize technology, powering wind turbine motors and giving juice to electric cars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That magnet would help revolutionize technology, powering wind turbine motors and giving juice to electric cars.

sentences.en: The discovery of the new drug has revolutionized the treatment of many diseases.
sentences.cn: 这种新药的发现已经使许多疾病的疗法起了根本性的变化。
